name: My Inner Guardian
description:
The child is sleeping, but it is not a quiet sleep. Nightmares haunt her dreams, reflections of her past and of what she has been into. The player will impersonate the child's oniric version of her favorite puppet and will have the task to save and reconnect her memories in order to mend her endangered mind. 
My Inner Guardian is a game about fighting nightmares in an oniric setting, but it’s also a game about the most inner and dark side of the human mind, the one that only dreams can express.

FEATURES:

  • Quick-paced twin-stick shooting
  • Different weapons and powers to choose from! - 4 weapons, each with unique damage, fire ratio, and range, 3 powers ready to be unleashed
  • Crush your enemies, mind control them, or disrupt their fabric! - Decide your own strategy according to the enemy you are confronting. Discover their weaknesses and take advantage!
  • Unique embroidery minigame - Interact with the environment, take your action and reach new areas
  • A grim and dark environment
  • Deep storyline - Discover what upsets the child’s sleep and what is the origin of the nightmare
  • Full controller support - Mouse or controller, we got it covered for you
